function.name: character_by_name
function.description: Returns information about a character from the show

name.description: The full name of a character from the show, e.g. `Morty Smith`

function.name: episode_by_id
function.description: Returns information about an episode from the show

episodeid.description: The identifier of an episode of the form `S##E##` where # is a single digit. For example, the episode id for episode 5 in season 2 is `S02E05`
